screensaver.name: razzledazzle
screensaver._description:
Generates an infinitely-scrolling sequence of dazzle camouflage patterns.
Dazzle Ships, in addition to being the best album by Orchestral Manoeuvres in the Dark, were military vessels during World War I and early in World War II that were painted not to conceal but to confuse: with these Cubist overlapping stripes, it was very hard to estimate their size, range and heading. This was a big deal before the invention of Radar.
